description.value:
Acid

Aura 2

While the medusa is bloodied, any enemy that ends its turn in the aura takes 10 acid damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Poison

Standard

Reach 2

+22 vs AC; 1d10+5 damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 poison damage and is slowed (save ends both).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Ranged 20/40

+22 vs AC; 2d10+5 damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to its Fortitude defense and is slowed (save ends both).

At-Will

Standard

The medusa makes two snaky hair attacks

At-Will

Standard

The medusa makes two longbow attacks

At-Will ✦ Psychic

Standard

Close blast 5

Targets enemies; +20 vs Fortitude; 2d6+3 psychic damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). First Failed Saving throw: The target is immobilized instead of slowed (save ends). Second Failed Saving Throw: The target is petrified (no save).

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fear, Psychic

Minor, Recharge

Close blast 5

Targets enemies; +20 vs Fortitude; 2d8+5 psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to defenses until the end of the medusa's next turn.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Reach 2

Trigger: When the medusa takes damage from an adjacent creature, at-will

+22 vs AC; 2d10+5 damage, and the medusa pushes the target 5 squares.

Encounter

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When the medusa is first bloodied, encounter

The medusa uses petrifying gaze
